newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech 39-wk T-bill auction gross yield 11.58 pct.
newsitem.headline: Czech 39-wk T-bill auction gross yield 11.58 pct.

text.p: The gross yield in Thursday's auction of a five billion crown tranche of 39-week Finance Ministry treasury bills hit 11.58 percent, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said.
The issue was oversubscribed with bids totalling 9.83 billion crowns, CNB said adding it accepted bids totalling 4.999 billion crowns.
Net yield hit 8.685 percent, the CNB said.
The nine month Prague Interbank Offered Rate (PRIBOR) stood at 11.99 percent on Thursday, up three basis points from Wednesday.
The Finance Ministry has not issued comparable bills this year, since the imposition of 25 percent withholding tax on state debt instruments on January 1.
